verses.text_plain: In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will God appoint for walls and bulwarks.
verses.verse_html: 1In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will God appoint for walls and bulwarks.

verses.text_plain: Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in.
verses.verse_html:
2Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in. ▼
▼ truth: Heb. truths

verses.text_plain: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
verses.verse_html:
3Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee. ▼
▼ perfect…: Heb. peace, peace
 , ▼
▼ mind: or, thought, or, imagination

footnotes.body_html: ▼ perfect…: Heb. peace, peace
▼ mind: or, thought, or, imagination

verses.text_plain: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength:
verses.verse_html:
4Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength: ▼
▼ everlasting…: Heb. the rock of ages

footnotes.body_text: ▼ everlasting…: Heb. the rock of ages
footnotes.body_html: ▼ everlasting…: Heb. the rock of ages

verses.text_plain: For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low, even to the ground; he bringeth it even to the dust.
verses.verse_html: 5For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low, even to the ground; he bringeth it even to the dust.

verses.text_plain: The foot shall tread it down, even the feet of the poor, and the steps of the needy.
verses.verse_html: 6The foot shall tread it down, even the feet of the poor, and the steps of the needy.

verses.text_plain: The way of the just is uprightness: thou, most upright, dost weigh the path of the just.
verses.verse_html: 7The way of the just is uprightness: thou, most upright, dost weigh the path of the just.

verses.text_plain: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O Lord, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.
verses.verse_html: 8Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O Lord, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.

verses.text_plain: With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 9With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.

tokens.text: me will I seek thee early

verses.text_plain: Let favour be shewed to the wicked, yet will he not learn righteousness: in the land of uprightness will he deal unjustly, and will not behold the majesty of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 10Let favour be shewed to the wicked, yet will he not learn righteousness: in the land of uprightness will he deal unjustly, and will not behold the majesty of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Lord, when thy hand is lifted up, they will not see: but they shall see, and be ashamed for their envy at the people; yea, the fire of thine enemies shall devour them.
verses.verse_html:
11Lord, when thy hand is lifted up, they will not see: but they shall see, and be ashamed for their envy at the people; yea, the fire of thine enemies shall devour them. ▼
▼ at…: or, toward thy people

footnotes.body_html: ▼ at…: or, toward thy people

verses.text_plain: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
verses.verse_html:
12Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us. ▼
▼ in us: or, for us

tokens.text: for us: for thou also hast wrought

footnotes.body_html: ▼ in us: or, for us

verses.text_plain: O Lord our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.
verses.verse_html: 13O Lord our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.

tokens.text: by thee only will we make mention

verses.text_plain: They are dead, they shall not live; they are deceased, they shall not rise: therefore hast thou visited and destroyed them, and made all their memory to perish.
verses.verse_html: 14They are dead, they shall not live; they are deceased, they shall not rise: therefore hast thou visited and destroyed them, and made all their memory to perish.

tokens.text: them, and made all their memory

verses.text_plain: Thou hast increased the nation, O Lord, thou hast increased the nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed it far unto all the ends of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 15Thou hast increased the nation, O Lord, thou hast increased the nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed it far unto all the ends of the earth.

verses.text_plain: Lord, in trouble have they visited thee, they poured out a prayer when thy chastening was upon them.
verses.verse_html:
16Lord, in trouble have they visited thee, they poured out a prayer when thy chastening was upon them. ▼
▼ prayer: Heb. secret speech

footnotes.body_html: ▼ prayer: Heb. secret speech

verses.text_plain: Like as a woman with child, that draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain, and crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 17Like as a woman with child, that draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain, and crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O Lord.

tokens.text: so have we been in thy sight

verses.text_plain: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
verses.verse_html: 18We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.

verses.text_plain: Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.
verses.verse_html: 19Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.

verses.text_plain: Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.
verses.verse_html: 20Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.

tokens.text: thyself as it were for a little

verses.text_plain: For, behold, the Lord cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain.
verses.verse_html:
21For, behold, the Lord cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain. ▼
▼ blood: Heb. bloods
